ConvAnalysisSummary.name: ConvAnalysisSummary
ConvAnalysisSummary.description: Represents the information stored for each run or refresh of Sales Signals.

AnalysisDate.description: The date when the actual data analysis was done, accounting for the delay between the refresh start time and the data analysis.

DataModelVersion.description: The data model version generated by Hawking.

Error.description: The error message sent by Hawking when a refresh fails.

FlowIdentifier.description: Required. The UUID used to track the Hawking flow ID.

RefreshDate.description: Required. The date when the admin started the refresh of their ECI data for processing.

Status.description: Required. The status of the refresh or run.

TotalCalls.description: The total number of calls that were analyzed for Sales Signals.

TotalMentions.description: The total number of mentions or keywords that were analyzed.
